item.title: Pandemic set off deadly rise in speeding that hasn't stopped...
item.description:

The latest data shows the number of highway deaths in 2020 was the greatest in more than a decade even though cars and trucks drove fewer miles during the pandemic.

item.title: To shake hands or not? Age-old human gesture now in limbo...
item.description:
